name: Bullet Blast
description:
Grab a friend and face off in one of three tanks as you try to blast each other to bits. Go head to head in 6 different arenas while jamming out to authentic 8-bit music.

-Logitech/Xbox 360 Controllers supported

-Fullscreen support

Download the Bullet Blast Soundtrack which contains all 9 songs, as well as all the sound effects. If you don't already have NSFImport, you will need it to load and play the songs.
